Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry.protobuf

Class ProtobufWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry.protobuf.ProtobufWriter
  • public class ProtobufWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Zero-dependency Protobuf binary encoder. Implements the wire format as per https://protobuf.dev/programming-guides/encoding/

    Wire types:

    • 0 = VARINT (int32, int64, uint32, uint64, sint32, sint64, bool, enum)
    • 1 = I64 (fixed64, sfixed64, double)
    • 2 = LEN (string, bytes, embedded messages, packed repeated fields)
    • 5 = I32 (fixed32, sfixed32, float)

    This writer outputs to a WritableByteChannel, handling non-blocking channels by retrying writes until all bytes are written. For writing to a ByteBuffer, use ByteBufferChannel.

    Author:
    Chris Burdess

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  ProtobufWriter.MessageContent
      Interface for writing embedded message content.

      • writeTag

        public void writeTag​(int fieldNumber,
                     int wireType)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a field tag. Tag format: (fieldNumber << 3) | wireType
        Parameters:
        fieldNumber - the field number (1-based)
        wireType - the wire type
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • writeVarint

        public void writeVarint​(long value)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Writes an unsigned varint (base-128 encoding). Each byte has 7 bits of data and MSB as continuation bit.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to write
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • writeSVarint

        public void writeSVarint​(long value)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a signed varint using ZigZag encoding. Maps signed to unsigned: 0→0, -1→1, 1→2, -2→3, etc.
        Parameters:
        value - the signed value to write
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • writeMessageField

        public void writeMessageField​(int fieldNumber,
                              ProtobufWriter.MessageContent content)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Writes an embedded message field. The content is written using a callback that receives a nested writer.

        Note: This method buffers the message content internally to compute its length before writing, which is required by the protobuf wire format.

        Parameters:
        fieldNumber - the field number
        content - the message content writer
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • writeEncodedMessageField

        public void writeEncodedMessageField​(int fieldNumber,
                                     java.nio.ByteBuffer encodedMessage)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Writes length prefix and copies pre-encoded message bytes. Use this when the message is already serialized.
        Parameters:
        fieldNumber - the field number
        encodedMessage - the pre-encoded message bytes
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • varintSize

        public static int varintSize​(long value)
        Calculates the size of a varint in bytes.
        Parameters:
        value - the value
        Returns:
        the size in bytes (1-10)
